html: 10.4.18  12:59 pm   I want to draw again, but I'm terrified for some reason. Wait till the craving overcomes the fear? Any way to speed that up?

10.4.18  11:43 am   Can you be serious?
10.4.18  11:30 am   You make amazing songs that makes people happy (including me). My question is: Are you also happy / excited while making your songs?

10.4.18  11:20 am   How come songs that end in a fade out often fade out when the song is reaching it's grooviest point? Like, in mt st helens, I feel like that solo was just starting to get really crazy when it faded out?

10.4.18  11:19 am   10.4.18  12:34 am will you really tho? you have hundreds of songs waiting to be produced and likely thousands more original ideas that will follow. You'll die before creating all the content you want to create, let alone covering other people's content

sorry i used capitals.

10.4.18  9:08 am   Is the meaning of the lyrics in your songs ambiguous

      and do the lyrics represent things that happen/happened in your life?

10.4.18  8:26 am   When we die, we will lose our memories, so what's the point on making them? Is it like doing them just for the while and avoid getting bored? Because our final achievement it's always to die, but it's like the one where we lose all the progress we've made, meaning it like a videogame. Anyway, when i die i won't get worried or think about anything at all, so now that i can, i ask you, Why are we alive and concious of it, if we die?  I bet the forces of creation are the sadistic ones.
10.4.18  7:21 am   For my media assignment is there anything you would like to say that your music videos have achieved?
10.4.18  6:50 am   What keeps you going?

10.4.18  6:46 am   You said that in order to learn how to change keys smoothly, I should study songs that do it. I've never analyzed a song before. What should I be looking for when analyzing?

      Other than maybe some Roman numerals, I don't know what else to look for because that can't be enough to understand it completely, right? What am I missing?

10.4.18  1:08 am   Hi Bill

With having such a success with your YouTube videos, generating millions of views, do you ever feel pressured to upload videos constantly even when you don't have anything planned?

      And do you ever feel people are going to get sick of the whole "randomness" of your videos? (Not me of course. I'm a big fan)

      I'm pretty sure you got new concepts up you sleeve!

Sorry. I used to Adobe CS Suite just like you.
